title: Topic 001 Question 005
body: A company hosts its website on Amazon EC2 instances behind an Application Load Balancer. The company manages its DNS with Amazon Route 53, and wants to point its domain's zone apex to the website.
Which type of record should be used to meet these requirements?
options: An AAAA record for the domain's zone apex
An A record for the domain's zone apex
A CNAME record for the domain's zone apex
An alias record for the domain's zone apex
